actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to make certain changes in the places of holding Federal district courts, in the divisions within judicial districts, and in judicial district dividing lines.

summary.text: Federal District Court Organization Act - Makes specified changes in the places of holding Federal district courts, in the divisions within judicial districts, and in judicial district dividing lines.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to make certain changes in the places of holding Federal district courts, in the divisions within judicial districts, and in judicial district dividing lines.
